data.actual_result: (depends on how fast and long u've clicked) it created 2 or even more popups
data.expected_result: only one popup should be created
data.short_description: clicking quickly on the retry button creates multiple "failed attachment" popups [might need a few attempts to repro]
data.steps_to_repro: - getting the "failed attachment popup" (for example by lossing the permission to attach while sending an attachement - click "retry" with about 7-8 clicks per second for roughly 10 seconds - observe result
